subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jeff Francoeur, the Mets’ right fielder with a first class glove and an inconsistent bat, was traded to the Texas Rangers on Tuesday night for Joaquin Arias, a utility infielder.
snippet: Jeff Francoeur, the Mets’ right fielder with a first class glove and an inconsistent bat, was traded to the Texas Rangers on Tuesday night for Joaquin Arias, a utility infielder.
